Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.actuator.health.http

Class HttpHealthIndicators

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.actuator.health.http.HttpHealthIndicators
  • public class HttpHealthIndicators
extends Object
    HttpHealthIndicators contains several functions that implement health checks for HTTP endpoints.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.Health alwaysHealthy()
      A dummy health function that always returns health status UP.
      static org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.Health alwaysUnknown​(org.apache.camel.Endpoint endpoint)
      Returns Health information based on the the URL from the Endpoint.
      static Function<org.apache.camel.Endpoint,​org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.Health> urlHealthIndicator​(String url, int timeout)
      Returns health checking function using custom url along with desired timeout.
      static org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.Health urlHealthIndicator​(org.apache.camel.Endpoint endpoint)
      Returns Health information based on the ability to perform GET HTTP request using the URL from the Endpoint.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • alwaysHealthy

        public static org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.Health alwaysHealthy()
        A dummy health function that always returns health status UP.
        Returns:
        Health

      • alwaysUnknown

        public static org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.Health alwaysUnknown​(org.apache.camel.Endpoint endpoint)
        Returns Health information based on the the URL from the Endpoint.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - Endpoint singleton
        Returns:
        Returns health status UNKNOWN for every detected endpoint if not further specified

      • urlHealthIndicator

        public static org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.Health urlHealthIndicator​(org.apache.camel.Endpoint endpoint)
        Returns Health information based on the ability to perform GET HTTP request using the URL from the Endpoint.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - Endpoint singleton
        Returns:
        Returns health status UP if it successfully execute the request, UNKNOWN if HTTP response code is not 2xx, or DOWN if request fails for any other reason.

      • urlHealthIndicator

        public static Function<org.apache.camel.Endpoint,​org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.Health> urlHealthIndicator​(String url,
                                                                                                                          int timeout)
        Returns health checking function using custom url along with desired timeout.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to use when performing the health check
        timeout - the timeout
        Returns:
        function that checks health of the HTTP endpoint
